pageProduct.name: Sebirinse 200G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Specially formulated for use after scalp cleansing and anti-dandruff treatments, this gentle conditioner protects your hair and helps prevent dryness. SebiRinse restores shine and adds body, leaving your hair feeling great.

Warnings

CAUTION:
Avoid eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Always read the label. Use only as directed.

If symptoms persist please see your healthcare professional.

Common Uses

• Visibly rejuvenates and protects treated hair.
• Removes any lingering odours from hair that’s been treated with therapeutic shampoos.
• Non-oily, water-based formulation avoids waxy build-up on hair, which can aggravate scalp conditions.
• Will not damage permed or coloured hair.
• Soap-free and gentle enough to use every day.

Ingredients

Purified water, propylene glycol, cetearyl acolhol, dicetyldimonium cholride, panthenol, cetomacrogol 1000, PEG-150 disterate, phenethyl alcohol, fragrance.

Directions

After using Sebitar, massage Sebirinse through hair. Leave on for approximately 2 minutes. Rinse.
